label: Efetov, Konstantin А., Axel Hofmann & Gerhard M. Tarmann.  2014. Application of two molecular approaches (use of sex attractants and DNA barcoding) allowed to rediscover Zygaenoprocris eberti (Alberti, 1968) (Lepidoptera, Zygaenidae, Procridinae), hitherto known only from the female holotype. Nota lepidopterologica 37(2): 151-160.
